contentList.content:
Character is wearing the Mask of Mimicry, transforming them into a mime.
Cannot cast spells in combat
Mimics the actions of party members while in combat
Enable Summoned Creature Mimicking - Mimes will mimic skills used by summoned creatures.
Spotless pants worn by a mime. The flexible material enables quick movement. Seems to grow as you do.
*Change your mind and nonchalantly shrug, stepping away.*
Character's presence is slipping from reality, providing increased damage resistance.
Character is counter-attacking enemies when dodging.

*A swell of dark energy releases from the music box. Clearly the ritual had a price, as the box looks more worn and cracked than it did before. Additionally, the music box feels lighter, like it did before the mask was placed inside.*
Character was hit by a brawler's unarmed combo attack. Ouch!
*The mime repeatedly rotates his fists near his eyes, making a crying gesture.*
*The mime taps his chest with his thumb, then points to you, and waggles his index and middle finger, imitating a person walking.*
*The phantom peers at you with a cold gaze, obscured by a mask.*
*It seems the music box can be used to revive the dead Mime by placing the Mask of Mimicry within.*
*The music box clicks and a panel opens. Inside is an indention, shaped like the Mask of Mimicry. A series of glyphs are inscribed on the inside of the lid.*
*The mime taps the amulet, then swings his right forearm infront of him, like a shield is attached. It seems it provides some sort of protection.*
*You hear a faint voice inside your mind.* "Sacrifice the physical to see your power grow..."
Mimicking skill. Learn to mimic the Sourcerers of Legend and surpass your limits.
*Rip the mask away from the phantom, claiming it for your own.*

Dodging is increased by [1]%|[2]%|[3]% on turns 1|2|3
Movement speed is increased by [4]% on the first turn.
While Counter Throw is active, you have a 90% chance to counter-attack for [5] when dodging.
Character is being flanked and repositioned!
<font color='#FF0000'>*The mime's equipment dissipates as it returns to its original owner.*</font>
Mimicry Unleashed - Unlock the power bestowed by the Mask of Mimicry
Character is being granted an extra skill from a nearby Beastmaster.

Mimic a target completely, becoming a perfect copy for 2 turns.
Doppelgangers copy the skills, equipment, stats, and abilities of the target.
Sturdy boots worn by a mime. Steel-toed. As you gain experience, the boots seem to get tougher.

Slam the ground, launching enemies within [1] up into the air.
Deals [2] initially, and [3] to [4] when they land (scales with launch height).
Each target hit creates another quake, launching enemies within [5] and dealing [6].
A small music box. The key on the side can be turned to wind it up.
*The mime excitedly gives you the amulet, as he eagerly anticipates your supposed joke.*
*The mask remains silent. Perhaps it's busy?*
[SUCCESS] *The glyphs tell the story of a dead person rising from the grave, awakened by the tune of a music box. The last symbol seems be the person dancing merrily with a mask on their face.*
Disable Summoned Creature Mimicking - Mimes will not mimic skills used by summoned creatures (Default).
*Go through with liquidating the Mask's inventory.*
*The mask's voice softens until you no longer hear it.*
*Smugly take your leave, revenge in hand.*
Tough leather gloves worn by a mime. A solid punch is sure to sting. Seems to grow tougher over time.
*The mime waves his hand in a politely dismissive manner. He seems happy to just be alive again.*
*Convince the mime that you'll give the amulet right back. You just need to see it for a second.*

Appear behind an enemy and land a blow for [1] + [2].
Before initial damage is dealt, enemies receive [3]% Dodge and [4]% Physical Resistance from being Flanked.
After flanking the enemy, your positions are Swapped.
Grounded targets are immune to being Swapped.
Remove all Mimicry statuses. Will also unequip your mask.
*The mime slips gestures in a fit of feigned despair, and stops following you.*
A rare subset of elves imbued with dark energy. Some surmise that the Dark Elves are a result of the influence of an alien being, or perhaps the Void itself.
Mime skill. Learn to quiet others with a piercing, cold gaze.

*Disable self-preservation when mimicking specific self-targeting healing spells. If a non-undead casts a spell such as First Aid on themselves, and you're undead, you will no longer ignore mimicking that action.*

Mime skill. Contains a walkthrough for fatal techniques.
F, F, B, B, BL
F, F, F, HP
B, D, F, LP
F, B, B, B, HP
F, D, F, HP
Hold BL U, U
[BACK] *Stop thinking about ways to break the universe.*
*Finalize all sacrifices. The Mask of Mimicry will fully consume every sacrificed, non-mime item.*

Dodging is increased by [1]%|[2]%|[3]% on turns 1|2|3
Movement speed is increased by [4]% on the first turn.
While Counter Throw is active, you have a 90% chance to counter-attack for [5] when dodging.
Weapon Expansion
When dodging an enemy, you have a 60% chance to counter-attack with a rock.

Prevents mimicking from automatically occuring.
Using this skill again will cancel the effect.
By default, mimicking is automatically disabled when Invisible.
Mimicking Info:
When in combat, Mimes mimic the skills, basic attacks, and item usage of the party, with the following restrictions:
Mimes cannot mimic skills that: require Source Points, are 'Special' Shout skills, directly summon creatures, and skills that are of the Rush/Jump type.
When mimicking, Mimes copy the weapon(s) used.
[DISMISS] *Tell the mime to leave the party.*
*As your fist connects with the mime's mask, you hear a soft gasp as he's propelled backwards.*
Character has been sealed, turning them to stone.
Refresh mask. This will remove all Mimicry statuses and re-equip your mask.
[?] *Make a guess and place the Mask of Mimicry in the indention.*
[SETTINGS] *Reflect on your life as a Mime.*
*A swell of dark energy releases from the music box once more. The music box then shatters to pieces.*
Enable a -10% damage debuff while mimicking.
<font color='#FF0000'>With the Music Box <font color='#FF7F50' size='24'>shattered</font>, the Mime suffers his final death...</font>
A pitifully weak attack that deals [1].
*As you place the mask inside the music box, a "click" echoes from within. Suddenly, the lid snaps shut, and the music box begins to rapidly shake.*
*As you pick yourself back up, the mime imitates what can only be described as an "Obnoxious Jester".*

Force yourself to evolve, transcending into a more powerful form.
Accelerating nature is strains the body, resulting in death after [1] turns.
Additionally grants a [2]% Damage and [3]% Critical Chance boost.
Explode, dealing [1] to enemies in a large area around you. Creates fire surfaces.
Mime skill. Learn to disarm your enemies with precise strikes.
Character has been granted the skill <font color='#a189ec'>Timely Retreat</font>.

*Enable self-preservation when mimicking item usage. If an undead drinks a poison potion (and you're not undead), or a non-undead drinks a healing potion (and you're undead), you will skip mimicking that action.*
*As the music box radiates a strange tune, a masked figure appears before you.*
*The mime continues to silently praise you until a crick in his neck, presumably from dying, slows the workship to a painful crawl.*
Enable a -50% damage debuff while mimicking.
A warrior who abandoned their identity, instead mimicking the actions of allies in battle. Mimes are also proficient with unarmed combat, and provide bonuses to summoned creatures.

Stare at an enemy with cold intensity.
If the target is Crippled, apply Terrified for 1 turn.
A vague sense of magic can be felt emanating from the amulet. It seems to provide some protection to source, but only for its original owner.
*You steady your grip on the music box as it continues to shake. Inside the box, it feels as if something is building up...*
*The mime looks at you with tears in his eyes. He falls to his knees and workships your feet.*
Character has sacrified themselves for their party.
Mime is mimicking their leader's actions.
[MYSTIC] *Study the symbols around the indentation, using your keen insight on ancient glyphs.*
*Revel in the workship a bit longer.*
[MIME] *Give the mime a silent nod. The kind of greeting only other mimes would recognize.*
*You place your hands on each side of the mask, and with a hefty tug, you rip it away from the phantom.*
<font color='#FF0000'>*You try to fight like a brawler, but it is futile.*</font>
<font color='#6A5ACD'>*You summon the mime to your position.*</font>
Character's maximum vitality is reduced. Deals [1] internally each turn.
A warrior who mimics the actions of allies in battle. Mimes are also proficient with unarmed combat, and provide additional skills and bonuses to nearby summoned creatures.
*Let bygones be bygones and part ways.*

Deal [1] and disarm an enemy for 2 turns.
If the target is Knocked Down, steal a random amount of gold.
Weapon Expansion
When mugging the target, steal a throwable copy of their weapon for 2 turns.

Set the direction to look when your turn ends.
Tip: Mimicking factors in the mime's look direction, so facing the right way is important for setting up mimicked actions.
Cleared when your turn starts.
A mime who is following the party.
<font color='#FFFFFF'>*It seems unwise to play with a music box while in combat...*</font>
Mime skill. Learn to dodge with strategic foot placement.
A spiffy jacket worn by a mime. Fits comfortably, and seems to get stronger as you do.
*A haunting voice echoes in your head.* "Non-reversible. No refunds."
Mime skill. Learn to the most effective way to hit people in the knees. Ouch!
[SUCCESS] *The mime slightly shrugs his shoulders and removes the amulet, placing it in your hand. He watches you like a hawk, fully expecting to get the amulet back.*
*Apologize for stealing the mask in the first place.*
Mime skill. Learn to seal the undead.
*Inquire about the amulet the mime is wearing.*

Character has been transformed into a frog.
Damage is majorly reduced, Muted and Atrophy are applied.

Character is increasing the power of nearby summons.
Allied summons within [1]m gain an extra skill
Spray targets in a cone with water, dealing [1], setting Wet, and dousing surfaces.
Mime skill. Learn to launch people with intense stomping.

*Disable self-preservation when mimicking item usage. If an undead drinks a poison potion (and you're not undead), or a non-undead drinks a healing potion (and you're undead), you will no longer skip mimicking that action.*
[FAILED] *The mime gives you a stern look of disapproval, and shakes his head "No".*
[JESTER] *Tell the mime you have a great joke planned, and need the amulet as a prop.*
Mime skill. Learn to create a decoy and distract your enemies.
Enable a -25% damage debuff while mimicking.

Deal [1] and disarm an enemy for 2 turns.
If the target is Knocked Down, steal a random amount of gold.
[FAILED] *You have no idea what this thing does.*
*The mime gives you a once-over, before silently nodding in return.*
*Motion for the mime to follow you.*
[BACK] *Return to deciding what to focus on next.*
Enable a -75% damage debuff while mimicking.

Character is fighting in an unarmed stance.
Unarmed damage scales with Strength
Every 3rd unarmed attack deals bonus damage
Critical hits have a 25% chance to cause a Double Strike
+[1]% Dodge

Sacrifice your life to restore the lives of your party members.
Restores 50% Vitality, and applies Final Wish, which makes the target resist death until the start of their turn, or they reach 1 Vitality.
Perish after casting.
Unarmed Combo - Every 3rd unarmed strike on a target applies bonus damage

*Enable self-preservation when mimicking specific self-targeting healing spells. If a non-undead casts a spell such as First Aid on themselves, and you're undead, you will ignore mimicking that action.*
*You hit the ground hard, landing on your back.*

Character is a mime.
Cannot cast spells in combat
Mimics the actions of their owner in combat

Toggles the use of the Brawler's Fist, an unarmed weapon that scales to your level and chosen attribute.
Every few levels, the Brawler's Fist gains a new bonus.

Character is gifted in unarmed combat.
+[1]% Physical Resistance while unarmed
Grants the 'Brawler Stance' skill
Your history before wearing the Mask of Mimicry appears to be completely lost. Who are you truly?
*The glyphs appear to tell the story of a humanoid-shaped body, once dead, rising from the grave. The last symbol seems to display the person dancing merrily, with the mask on their face.*

Character is fighting in an unarmed stance.
Unarmed damage scales with Constitution
Every 3rd unarmed attack deals bonus damage
Critical hits have a 25% chance to cause a Double Strike
+[1]% Dodge

Character is highly focused, ensuring attacks will never miss.
+[1]% accuracy while unarmed
Miscellaneous skill. Learn to sacrifice your health to heal others. Legend says that unique squires in a distant kingdom perfected this skill.
*Flutter your left hand around, to the right side of the mime, attempting to draw his attention in that direction.*
*You help the mime up to his feet. He dusts his pants off before giving you a hearty thumbs-up.*
Character takes piercing damage when moving, and risks falling down.
Mime skill. Learn to mimic the martyrs of old, and unlock the ability to sacrifice yourself for your party.
*The mime hesitates for a moment, then shakes his head.*
Return to your original position before jumping with <font color='#a189ec'>Hidden Approach</font>.
*You focus on your inner identity, masked behind the veil of the Mime.*
Refresh Mime Armor - This will remove all mime armor and recreate it. Useful if your deltamods get bugged out.

Jump to a distant position under a cloak of shadows, placing a decoy at your initial spot.
The decoy taunts nearby enemies at the end of your turn.
Automatically disables mimicking by default.
The iron-hard fist of a Brawler. Strikes true.

Character is counter-attacking enemies when dodging.
Weapon Expansion
When dodging an enemy, you have a 60% chance to counter-attack with a rock.
Character has been launched into the air!

If Constitution is greater, gain +[1]% Max Vitality (Strengthened Vitals) and inflict [2]% Max Vitality (Weakened Vitals) on target for [3] turns.
Weakened Vitals additionally deals [4] each turn.
<font color='#FF69B4' size='20'>*You feel the mask grow stronger. New power awaits...*</font>
Use the Mask of Mimicry's power to return to your leader.
A small shard of a broken music box.
<font color='#FF0000'>*You can't equip the Mask of Mimicry in combat!*</font>
*The mime puts the amulet back on and gives you a thumbs up.*
*You focus your thoughts on the mask...*
*Help the mime back up, assuring him that it was no problem at all.*
Mime is mimicking the party's next source skill.

Release the dark energy within your mask, dealing [1] + [3] in a [2] radius.
Enemies who die explode in a cursed cloud of darkness.
Initial damage scales with your maximum vitality.
Shadow Damage bypasses armor and cannot be resisted.
*Sucker punch the mime right in his smug, creepy face.*
A warrior who mimics the actions of allies in battle
*Suddenly, the mime sweeps your legs in a swift half-circle kick.*

Petrify the Undead, dealing [1] and Sealing the target for 1 turn.
Removes Bleeding, Burning, and Poisoned.
Clears surfaces within a 2m range around the target.
*The mime looks to your hand, gesturing as if he had a magnifying glass.*
Mime skill. Learn to flank an enemy while keeping a tactical position.

Let loose the dark energy within your being, enveloping yourself in a protective veil.
While in the Shadow Form, damage is reduced by [1]% while in a smoke cloud, you gain [2]% increased Dodge, and each attack has a chance to deal [3] to targets.
Shadow Damage bypasses armor and cannot be resisted.
<font color='#FF0000'>*The music box shatters to pieces!*</font>

Focus on your inner self behind the mask, diving deep within your mind.
Opens the Mimicry menu.

Surpass your limits, mimicking the next source skill used by a party member.
While this skill is learned:
Regenerate [1] SP every 60 seconds outside of combat, or 10 turns within combat.
*You stop yourself for a moment. Surely what you're about to do is irreversable. Should you continue?*
[HOST] *Contemplate the power of the cosmos (Host Settings).*
*The mime hits the ground with a hard thug, immediately going unconscious.*
Character has forcefully evolved. <font color='#FF0000'>Death is imminent.</font>
Adds a new "class" called the Mime. Mimes can mimic the actions of allies in battle, utilize Mime-only skills, take advantage of Mime-only passives, and pummel enemies with scaled unarmed damage.

The mask of a warrior who can mimic the actions of allies in battle.
Transforms the wearer into a Mime, granting new skills and innate abilities.
Automatically grows with its wearer, gaining new bonuses at various levels.
*Resurrect the Mime using a spare Resurrection Scroll found on his body.*
*The phantom cries out in pain and dissipates. The mask is now yours.*

Belch forth putrid stench to inflict status ailments.
Reduces Physical Armour on targets in a cone by [1], and causes random status ailments on targets hit.
Jump to a distant position and gain <font color='#a189ec'>Timely Retreat</font> for 2 turns, allowing you to return to your original position before jumping.
<font color='#EE82EE'>*As you turn the key, the music box echoes an off-beat jingle.*</font>
Summons a storm to rage upon the target area for 1 turn, dealing [1] per hit.
[SCHOLAR] *Study the symbols around the indentation, using what little you've read about ornate, magical music boxes over the years.*

Poke an enemy in the eyes, dealing [1] damage and blinding them for 1 turn.
Blind bypasses armor.
<font color='#FF0000'>*The mime shrugs. Seems he doesn't want to read that.*</font>
*The mask refuses to budge... Has it ever come off?*
<font color='#FF0000'>*The music box key refuses to twist.*</font>
Sacrifice <font color='#FF0000'>50% Vitality</font> to <font color='#97fbff'>restore twice as much</font> to an ally.

Character can taste the smell in their mouth. Yuck!
Bad Breath causes random status ailments.
Character is invisible while their decoy is active. Removed by casting skills, attacking, water, or taking damage.
*You pocket the amulet and take your leave.*
Enable a -90% damage debuff while mimicking.
A small music box. Cracked after placing the Mask of Mimicry inside.
*Tell the mime to conceal their innate abilities (Hide permanent passive statuses).*
*The music box clicks and opens again. You already know what to do.*

Strike a target with a deathblow, dealing [1].
Damage is doubled if the target is disabled.
If this skill kills the target, the cooldown is reset.
Character has been enveloped in dark energy.
The iron-hard fist of a Brawler. Strikes true.
*Tell the mime to reveal their innate abilities (Enable passive status visibility).* (Default)
Mime skill. Learn how to weaken enemies through superiority of body.

Deal [1] to target character, breaking their knee with a swift blow. When they try to move, they will take piercing damage.
If the target is Disarmed, apply Bleeding for 2 turns.
Character is a perfect copy of another.
*The mime gives you a brisk salute, and then marches in place as he waits for you to lead the way.*
Character is resisting death until the start of their turn, or their Vitality is 1.
*Tell the mime to re-adjust their mask.* (Refresh Mime Status)
Character is mimicking the party's actions.
*The mime waits for you to speak.*

Character is fighting in an unarmed stance.
Unarmed damage scales with Finesse
Every 3rd unarmed attack deals bonus damage
Critical hits have a 25% chance to cause a Double Strike
+[1]% Dodge
<font color='#FF0000'>*Only a mime can learn that!*</font>
